tweet: "Righteousness can not be attained by the works of the law because it can only be attained through faith." ~Lover of Words #Faithtalk
Whosoever believes on the Lord Jesus Christ shall not be ashamed! #Faithtalk
"Believers in the LORD Jesus Christ are sanctified by faith." ~Lover of words #Faithtalk
